com.ulflander.minethat.utils.cache
Class Cache<String,V>

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      java.util.HashMap<String,V>
          com.ulflander.minethat.utils.cache.Cache<String,V>
Type Parameters:
String - Keys of cache items
V - Values of cache items
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,V>
public class Cache<String,V>
extends HashMap<String,V>

Cache is a HashMap where items disappeared once timeout reached.

Since:
2/21/14
Author:
Ulflander
See Also:
Serialized Form
